people_also_ask.question: What is the real definition of beauty?
people_also_ask.heading: Full Definition of beauty 1 : the quality or aggregate of qualities in a person or thing that gives pleasure to the senses or pleasurably exalts the mind or spirit : loveliness a woman of great physical beauty exploring the natural beauty of the island A thing of beauty is a joy forever …— John Keats.
people_also_ask.title: Beauty Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster

people_also_ask.question: What is the deep meaning of beauty?
people_also_ask.heading: the quality present in a thing or person that gives intense pleasure or deep satisfaction to the mind, whether arising from sensory manifestations (as shape, color, sound, etc.), a meaningful design or pattern, or something else (as a personality in which high spiritual qualities are manifest).
people_also_ask.title: Beauty Definition & Meaning | Dictionary.com

people_also_ask.question: What is the synonym of beauty?
people_also_ask.heading: attractiveness, prettiness, good looks, pleasingness, comeliness, allure, allurement. loveliness, charm, appeal, heavenliness, voluptuousness. winsomeness, grace, elegance, exquisiteness. splendour, magnificence, grandeur, impressiveness, picturesqueness, artistry, decorativeness. gorgeousness, glamour, irresistibility.
people_also_ask.title: Synonyms of beauty in English - Lexico.com
